name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Ruby Engineer with over 13 years of experience in developing robust applications and deploying them in compliance-driven environments. Proficient in **Ruby**, **Ruby on Rails**, **SQL**, and **PostgreSQL**, along with a strong focus on **Docker**, **Terraform**, and **Kubernetes** for containerization and orchestration. Skilled in API development and implementation of **test-driven development** methodologies to ensure high-quality code and maintainable software solutions.
Demonstrated ability to engage in **open-source supply chain** management and enhance application security through solid **cybersecurity** practices. Additionally, I bring extensive experience in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and **AI/ML** technologies, with hands-on expertise across frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. My background includes deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, integrating microservices, and establishing CI/CD pipelines, which ensures efficient and seamless development workflows.
